title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
You can succeed any check to see the sisters require practice and bring up the new dialogue option. Then convince him to have the sisters practice on themselves.

Have Malus Thorm Operate on Himself

Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic Infiltrate Moonrise Towers

Requirements/Details:

Approach Malus Thorm in the House of Healing and say your a student. Succeed a DC 14 Check on any of the options (class appearing means advantage) to see the sister's need practice. Or Succeed on a Difficult religion Che
